author: Special Correspondent
text:
The entrance examination conducted by the Alagappa University for admission to M.Phil Summer Sequential Programmes for the academic year 2015-16 would be held on February 28, instead of February 27 as notified earlier, a university release issued here said.

It said February 12 would be the last date for issue and receipt of filled-in applications and the entrance examination would be held on February 28 (Sunday) from 10 a.m. to 12 noon on the university campus.

Candidates could apply for admission to the M Phil programmes in the disciplines of Tamil, English, Economics, Library and Information Science, Education, Physical Education, Commerce, Mathematics, Computer Science, Botany and Zoology, the release said.

The university also proposed to introduce M Phil programmes in Physics and Chemistry under week-end mode from the academic year 2016-17 and the admission notification would be released in due course, it said.

Candidates could visit the university website www.alagappauniversity.ac.in or contact telephone number 04565-22311 and 223113 for further details, the release said.
title: Change in entrance examination date
